div.h3: Why Purchasing From SPS Makes Sense

p.style: background: 0px 0px rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 3em; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px; color: rgb(50, 61, 73); font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif; font-size: 15px; line-height: 26px;

em.style: background: 0px 0px; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px;

p.em: SPS is an independent distributor of unused, in-date surgical disposables. We can sell your facility high-volume surgical disposables that you are currently buying from top vendors. However, we sell them at an even greater discount than your top tier pricing.

p.style: background: 0px 0px rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 1.5em; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px; color: rgb(50, 61, 73); font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif; font-size: 15px; line-height: 26px;
